channel.title: Relationship on Thread Recap

item.title: April Set 1
item.description: April Set 1 So when is development starting? Not for a while, but it’s fine, Squadron 42 will be released beforehand with a single player campaign. It’s scheduled to come out inâ€¦checks notes…2014?! https://www.gamespodcast.de/2020/03/15/runde-258-warum-spiele-verschoben-werden-ft-ralf-adam/ “Auf ein Bier” is the biggest and most successful Videogames podcast in German language. Their recent podcast is talking about deadlines, postponed games, project management and production of video games and the definition of “Alpha” and “Beta” and so on.
